snippet: California, so goes the cliche, is the wellspring of trends in nearly everything from chardonnays to beach sports to New Age music. Now California is pioneering again in something new: how to run a government without money.   Since July 1, unable ...
lead_paragraph: California, so goes the cliche, is the wellspring of trends in nearly everything from chardonnays to beach sports to New Age music. Now California is pioneering again in something new: how to run a government without money. Since July 1, unable to pass a budget, the state has been handing out i.o.u.'s instead of cash to anyone it can.

headline.main: Cash-Poor but Wily Californians Live by Their Chits
